paragraph: Ai Maeda (前田 愛, Maeda Ai, born April 19, 1975) is a Japanese voice actress born in Kobe, Hyōgo, Japan, employed by the talent management firm Aoni Production. She is also a singer under the name AiM and a songwriter under the name ai. She is best known in the English-speaking world for her work as both a voice actress and a singer in the original Japanese version of the Digimon anime series.
Real Sound: Kaze no Regret, Girls (1997)
Zatch Bell video games, Megumi Oumi (2003)
Samurai Warriors series, Oichi and Samurai Woman (2004-current)
Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side 2nd Kiss, Haruhi Nishimoto (2006)
Yggdra Union: We'll Never Fight Alone (PSP version), Nietzsche and Eudy (2008)
Nakagami, Yoshikatsu et al. "Voice Actress Spotlight". (June 2007) Newtype USA. pp. 112–113.
